thread.title: BA baggage handlers told to STOP urinating in plane holds
thread.title_full: BA baggage handlers told to STOP urinating in plane holds

title: BA baggage handlers told to STOP urinating in plane holds
text: show ad British Airways baggage handlers 'are told to STOP urinating in holds of planes because it could burn holes in the fuselage' Staff at airports across the country have allegedly been relieving themselves in the aircraft holds because the walk back to the terminal buildings is too far But after engineers discovered flaking metalwork inside, a warning was issued However, a British Airways spokesman said: 'We have no record of this'
